Getting started with dotnet conesole.

Ensure you have both the standard Cone package and the dotnet-conesole cli packages referenced from your project file: To build and run your specs, place yourself next to the relevant .csproj ensure all packages are restored and invoke dotnet conesole. 
$ cd <path to spec assembly>
$ dotnet restore
$ dotnet conesole
To avoid the build step that's done by passing "--no-build" 
$ dotnet conesole --no-build
Additional parameters are passed to the runner by appending them efter a "--". To enable multicore mode do: 
    $ dotnet conesole -- --multicore
Most parameters from the classic Conesole runner are supported.
